Articles.Content:
A few days ago I attempted to install a very old ship from around 2012 era of KSP. Upon opening its files I saw that it was very very much different from the standard ship files in the latest version of KSP. I am requesting that this could get a remake however I am not sure if it can. I couldn't find anything about the license so I am assuming All Rights Reserved. Here is a video demonstration of the ship (music is a bit loud so I'd watch out)

ship download file link: [LINK REMOVED]

Edited February 7, 2015 by Master Tao
remove link

Unfortunately, without a license, you can't post a download link for the mod, so I've removed it. Part (and ship) configs have changed quite a bit since this part was released, so it might be easier to create a new part, anyway.
Wouldn't it be awesome if there was a 1/1000 chance of a randomly generated asteroid being one of these?

I am also desperately waiting for someone to remake this death star so that we could use it with newer versions of ksp.

does anyone know how to do some cfg file editing etc. So that it could be made compatible ?

On 23 July 2016 at 4:44 PM, Darth Jeb said:

I am also desperately waiting for someone to remake this death star so that we could use it with newer versions of ksp.

does anyone know how to do some cfg file editing etc. So that it could be made compatible ?

 

You would need a lot more than cfg file editing, you need to make a new model.
